MetaCompliance Launch

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1980&user=10620> 	

In partnership with Chalhoub University, we are proud to launch our new Information Security Awareness Training Platform - MetaCompliance a key step in strengthening our Groupâ€™s culture of trust, resilience, and innovation. 

This training will equip every colleague with the practical knowledge: 

*	Recognize and respond to cyber threats. 
*	Protect company and customer data. 
*	Safely use our systems and technology in day-to-day work. 

 ðŸ“… Launch Date: 1st October 2025  
âœ… Mandatory: Yes - completing this training is part of our shared commitment to safeguarding our Customers and Group and ensuring compliance. 

You will soon receive your official enrolment email with login details and instructions.

Meditation Sessions

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1981&user=10620> 	

Rawan Albina - Director of the Leadership and Wellbeing Academies,  believes meditation is a simple pause with powerful benefits. In just 20 minutes, it helps you reconnect with yourself, find clarity, and bring calm into your day. 
Enrol now <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1981&user=10620>  and join the session to give your mind and body the reset it deserves.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png>
